sqlMap.select:
SELECT A.* FROM ( SELECT Z.*, ROWNUM AS RNUM FROM ( SELECT T1.PRT_AT_CODE ,T1.FEE_TP ,T1.FISCAL_YR ,T1.BILL_NO ,T1.AGENT_CODE ,T1.BZ_RGST_ID ,T1.AGENT_NAME ,T1.BILL_AMNT ,T1.VAT ,T1.BILL_DT ,T1.BILL_PRT_YN ,T1.AMNT_RSN ,T1.DUE_DATE ,(CASE WHEN T1.VAT_YN='0' OR T1.VAT_YN IS NULL THEN '면세' WHEN T1.VAT_YN='1' THEN '영세' WHEN T1.VAT_YN='2' THEN '과세' WHEN T1.VAT_YN='3' THEN '교부면제영세' END ) AS VAT_YN ,T1.FIRST_BILL_DT ,T1.RCVD_DT ,T1.EXMP_AMNT ,T1.DC_AMNT ,T1.DC_CODE ,T1.DC_RATE ,T1.RECPT_EPDT ,T1.LAST ,(CASE WHEN T1.RCVD_TP='0' THEN '미납' WHEN T1.RCVD_TP='1' THEN '연체' WHEN T1.RCVD_TP='2' THEN '연체수납' WHEN T1.RCVD_TP='3' THEN '수납' WHEN T1.RCVD_TP='4' THEN '불납' END ) AS RCVD_TP ,T1.STR_DATE ,T1.END_DATE ,T1.FAC_CODE ,T1.FAC_SUB_CODE ,T1.BILL_COUNT ,T4.PRT_KOR_NM ,T3.FEE_TP_KOR_NM ,T2.FAC_KOR_NM FROM PAYEOSU.REV_COLL_F@YGPA_PORTMIS T1 LEFT OUTER JOIN P2MGR.PRT_AT_CODE_F@YGPA_P2MGR T4 ON (T1.PRT_AT_CODE=T4.PRT_AT_CODE) LEFT OUTER JOIN PAYEOSU.FEE_TP_F@YGPA_PORTMIS T3 ON ( T1.PRT_AT_CODE=T3.PRT_AT_CODE AND T1.FEE_TP=T3.FEE_TP ) LEFT OUTER JOIN P2MGR.FACIL_NM_F@YGPA_P2MGR T2 ON ( T1.PRT_AT_CODE=T2.PRT_AT_CODE AND T1.FAC_CODE=T2.FAC_CODE AND T1.FAC_SUB_CODE=T2.FAC_SUB_CODE ) WHERE 1 = 1
AND T1.PRT_AT_CODE = #prtAtCode#
AND T1.BILL_DT>=TO_DATE(#sGrUsagePdFrom#,'YYYY-MM-DD')
AND T1.BILL_DT<=TO_DATE(#sGrUsagePdTo#,'YYYY-MM-DD')
AND T1.FEE_TP = #chrgeKndCd#
AND T1.RCVD_TP = #rcivSe#
AND T1.FISCAL_YR = #fiscalYr#
AND T1.BILL_NO = #nticno#
ORDER BY T1.BILL_DT )Z )A
WHERE ROWNUM <= #recordCountPerPage# and RNUM > #firstIndex#

SELECT COUNT(*) totcnt FROM PAYEOSU.REV_COLL_F@YGPA_PORTMIS T1 LEFT OUTER JOIN P2MGR.PRT_AT_CODE_F@YGPA_P2MGR T4 ON (T1.PRT_AT_CODE=T4.PRT_AT_CODE) LEFT OUTER JOIN PAYEOSU.FEE_TP_F@YGPA_PORTMIS T3 ON ( T1.PRT_AT_CODE=T3.PRT_AT_CODE AND T1.FEE_TP=T3.FEE_TP ) LEFT OUTER JOIN P2MGR.FACIL_NM_F@YGPA_P2MGR T2 ON ( T1.PRT_AT_CODE=T2.PRT_AT_CODE AND T1.FAC_CODE=T2.FAC_CODE AND T1.FAC_SUB_CODE=T2.FAC_SUB_CODE ) WHERE 1 = 1
AND T1.PRT_AT_CODE = #prtAtCode#
AND T1.BILL_DT>=TO_DATE(#sGrUsagePdFrom#,'YYYY-MM-DD')
AND T1.BILL_DT<=TO_DATE(#sGrUsagePdTo#,'YYYY-MM-DD')
AND T1.FEE_TP = #chrgeKndCd#
AND T1.RCVD_TP = #rcivSe#
AND T1.FISCAL_YR = #fiscalYr#
AND T1.BILL_NO = #nticno#

SELECT TRIM(TO_CHAR(COUNT(*), '999,999,999,999')) AS DP_TOT_CNT ,TRIM(TO_CHAR(NVL(SUM(T1.BILL_AMNT),0), '999,999,999,999')) AS SUM_BILL_AMNT ,TRIM(TO_CHAR(NVL(SUM(CASE WHEN T1.RCVD_TP = 2 OR T1.RCVD_TP = 3 THEN T1.BILL_AMNT END),0), '999,999,999,999')) AS SUM_RCVD_AMNT FROM PAYEOSU.REV_COLL_F@YGPA_PORTMIS T1 LEFT OUTER JOIN P2MGR.PRT_AT_CODE_F@YGPA_P2MGR T4 ON (T1.PRT_AT_CODE=T4.PRT_AT_CODE) LEFT OUTER JOIN PAYEOSU.FEE_TP_F@YGPA_PORTMIS T3 ON ( T1.PRT_AT_CODE=T3.PRT_AT_CODE AND T1.FEE_TP=T3.FEE_TP ) LEFT OUTER JOIN P2MGR.FACIL_NM_F@YGPA_P2MGR T2 ON ( T1.PRT_AT_CODE=T2.PRT_AT_CODE AND T1.FAC_CODE=T2.FAC_CODE AND T1.FAC_SUB_CODE=T2.FAC_SUB_CODE ) WHERE 1 = 1
AND T1.PRT_AT_CODE = #prtAtCode#
AND T1.BILL_DT>=TO_DATE(#sGrUsagePdFrom#,'YYYY-MM-DD')
AND T1.BILL_DT<=TO_DATE(#sGrUsagePdTo#,'YYYY-MM-DD')
AND T1.FEE_TP = #chrgeKndCd#
AND T1.RCVD_TP = #rcivSe#
AND T1.FISCAL_YR = #fiscalYr#
AND T1.BILL_NO = #nticno#

SELECT A.* FROM (SELECT Z.*, ROWNUM AS RNUM FROM ( SELECT T1.PRT_AT_CODE ,T1.FEE_TP ,T1.FISCAL_YR ,T1.BILL_NO ,T1.DLY_SER_NO ,T1.AGENT_CODE ,T1.BZ_RGST_ID ,T1.DLY_BILL_AMNT ,T1.DLY_BILL_DT ,T1.DLY_BILL_PRT_YN ,T1.DLY_BILL_RSN ,T1.DLY_DUE_DT ,T1.FIRST_BILL_DT ,T1.DLY_RCVD_DT ,T1.DC_RATE ,T1.RECPT_EPDT ,T1.STR_DATE ,T1.END_DATE ,T4.PRT_KOR_NM ,T3.FEE_TP_KOR_NM ,T2.FIRM_KOR_NM FROM PAYEOSU.ERP_UNPAIN_F@YGPA_PORTMIS T1 LEFT OUTER JOIN P2MGR.PRT_AT_CODE_F@YGPA_P2MGR T4 ON (T1.PRT_AT_CODE=T4.PRT_AT_CODE) LEFT OUTER JOIN PAYEOSU.FEE_TP_F@YGPA_PORTMIS T3 ON ( T1.PRT_AT_CODE=T3.PRT_AT_CODE AND T1.FEE_TP=T3.FEE_TP ) LEFT OUTER JOIN P2MGR.SHP_OWOP_F@YGPA_P2MGR T2 ON (T1.AGENT_CODE=T2.AGENT_CODE) WHERE 1=1
AND T1.PRT_AT_CODE = #prtAtCode#
AND T1.FEE_TP = #feeTp#
AND T1.FISCAL_YR = #fiscalYr#
AND T1.BILL_NO = #billNo#
ORDER BY T1.DLY_BILL_DT )Z )A
WHERE ROWNUM <= #recordCountPerPage# and RNUM > #firstIndex#

SELECT COUNT(*) totcnt FROM PAYEOSU.ERP_UNPAIN_F@YGPA_PORTMIS T1 LEFT OUTER JOIN P2MGR.PRT_AT_CODE_F@YGPA_P2MGR T4 ON (T1.PRT_AT_CODE=T4.PRT_AT_CODE) LEFT OUTER JOIN PAYEOSU.FEE_TP_F@YGPA_PORTMIS T3 ON ( T1.PRT_AT_CODE=T3.PRT_AT_CODE AND T1.FEE_TP=T3.FEE_TP ) LEFT OUTER JOIN P2MGR.SHP_OWOP_F@YGPA_P2MGR T2 ON (T1.AGENT_CODE=T2.AGENT_CODE) WHERE 1=1
AND T1.PRT_AT_CODE = #prtAtCode#
AND T1.FEE_TP = #feeTp#
AND T1.FISCAL_YR = #fiscalYr#
AND T1.BILL_NO = #billNo#

SELECT TRIM(TO_CHAR(COUNT(*), '999,999,999,999')) AS DP_TOT_CNT ,TRIM(TO_CHAR(NVL(SUM(T1.DLY_BILL_AMNT),0), '999,999,999,999')) AS SUM_DLY_BILL_AMNT FROM PAYEOSU.ERP_UNPAIN_F@YGPA_PORTMIS T1 LEFT OUTER JOIN P2MGR.PRT_AT_CODE_F@YGPA_P2MGR T4 ON (T1.PRT_AT_CODE=T4.PRT_AT_CODE) LEFT OUTER JOIN PAYEOSU.FEE_TP_F@YGPA_PORTMIS T3 ON ( T1.PRT_AT_CODE=T3.PRT_AT_CODE AND T1.FEE_TP=T3.FEE_TP ) LEFT OUTER JOIN P2MGR.SHP_OWOP_F@YGPA_P2MGR T2 ON (T1.AGENT_CODE=T2.AGENT_CODE) WHERE 1=1
AND T1.PRT_AT_CODE = #prtAtCode#
AND T1.FEE_TP = #feeTp#
AND T1.FISCAL_YR = #fiscalYr#
AND T1.BILL_NO = #billNo#
